categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014 articles

nodes.text: A New Hope for Radio is the first part of an article to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the Star Wars radio drama. It discusses how the project originated, and how hiring Star Wars author Brian Daley to work on the script made it a success. The article was written by Michael Kogge and appeared in Star Wars Insider 127. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014.
